Posts.Content: mj50withca wrote: I was just diagnosed on tuesday the 29th.  I have been bipolar for 1 1/2 years and I am worried about how this will effect me during my surgery and following treatments.  So far all I know is I am grade 2 stage 2A.  I will not know for sure until I get my MRI results on weds.  My surgery will be 10/14/09.  I am scared that I will become manic- I am still in shock.  We had to drive four hours to meet with surgeon, oncologist, etc.  I cried for the last 2 hours on the drive home.  Is anyone else bipolar and can you help me out? Dx 9/29/2009, IBC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I am also bipolar mj50withca aprilgirl1
